description:
This market will resolve according to “Yes” if the Chicago Bears franchise of the NFL officially announces its plan to move and play its home games permanently anywhere outside of the state of Illinois. Otherwise, it will resolve to “No”.

If the Chicago Bears have not announced a formal decision on the host city of its home games by December 31, 2026, 11:59 PM ET, this market will resolve to “No”.

For the purpose of this market, any temporary change in venue will not be considered.

For the purpose of this market, no naming changes will be taken into consideration, only official announcements about the home playing field of the Chicago Bears franchise.

The resolution source for this market will be official information from the Chicago Bears franchise and/or the NFL.

events.title: Will the Chicago Bears leave Illinois by 2027?

question: Will the Chicago Bears leave Illinois by 2027?
